LEVEL_POSITION Struct Reference

The level position type is a struct used to store information on each position of a map. More...

#include <LevelManager.h>


Data Fields

void * data
 The data pointer is a pointer to the data that is in this spot. If there is enemy at this location, it points to the particular enemy struct that is here.
POSITION_TYPE type
 Store what type of object is at this position.
char character
 Character that should be displayed in this position.

Detailed Description

The level position type is a struct used to store information on each position of a map.

For instance, if there is a wall in a given location, that position will have a pointer to a LEVEL_POSITION struct for all walls. The same goes for spaces, enemies, weapons, player, what ever.
